content: अमोघ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Unfailing, reaching the mark; धनुष्यमोघं समधत्त बाणं <ls>Ku. 3. 66</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 53</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 97</ls>; कामिलक्ष्येष्वमोधैः <ls>Me. 73.</ls> {@--2@} Unerring, infallible (words, boon &c.); अमोधाः प्रतिगृह्णंतावर्घ्यानुपदमाशिषः <ls>R. 1. 44</ls>; युतममोघतया <ls>Ki. 6. 40.</ls> {@--3@} Not vain or useless, efficacious, fruitful, productive; यदमोघमपामंतरुप्तं बीजमज त्वया <ls>Ku. 2. 5</ls>; so °बलं, °शक्ति, °वीर्य, °क्रोध &c. --घः {@--1@} Not failing or erring, unerringness. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu (or of Śiva according to some). {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a river. --घा {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the plant पाटलां (<ab>Mar.</ab> पाडळी) (the trumpet flower). {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of another plant विडंग (<ab>Mar.</ab> वावडिंग) the seed of which is used as a vermifuge, and hence also called कृमिघ्न. {@--3@} = पथ्या. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a spear or शक्ति. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva's wife. {@--6@} Mystical name of the conjunct consonant क्ष.
